citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 A.M. on
07-JUL-17.
The licensee did not provide a correct itinerary, or has not updated their itinerary with the Regional Office.
This attempted inspection was performed at the Central Florida Fairgrounds, Orlando, FL
